thread.section_title: Hotel Le 123 Elysees - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: good hotel- great location
thread.title_full: good hotel- great location - Review of Hotel Le 123 Elysees - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JohnT298
title: good hotel- great location
text: This is a typically French hotel. We had a superior room which was excellent - although it faced the main street (and hence some would call it 'noisy' - but it didn't bother us. only 5 minutes from the Champs Elysees. Hotel was friendly and the staff excellent. I would recommend.
